section.name: Contributing
section.p: We warmly welcome any help, especially from developers with some knowledge in Java/Swing and some experience in test-driven development.

The first thing you can do to help us is to use UISpec4J on you own projects and report evolution requests through our issue tracking system. Then, if you want to contribute to the coding effort, simply help us process the issues!
Do not hesitate to contact us in you are interested in joining our project.
